message: What do you suggest for a noob
convore, Pro HDR, evernote, audioboo; here they all are: http://www.flickr.com/photos/areaguides/sets/72157626583168516/
Convore, echfon, Snooker club, google voice if you have an account
you'll need to be more specific on the type of apps. meebo, twitter, skype, audio galaxy, 8tracks, runkeeper, photoshop express, photosynth, instagram, and of course, convore.
Twitter, SoundHound, Yelp, Dragon Dictation, Easy Alarms, PCalc Lite, Pulse, Google, Instagram, Simplenote, Dropbox, PlainText, Pandora, Runkeeper, Flashlight, The Weather Channel
If you listen to podcasts (and you should definitely check out all of 5by5's), you should get Instacast. Echofon for twitter is still the best.
stitcher all the way. joe rogan, doug benson, and kevin smith!
